name: Mahjong Gakuensai
overview:
Mahjong Gakuensai (麻雀学園祭) is a Sega Saturn mahjong game developed and published by Make Software. A port of the developer's titular arcade game Mahjong Gakuensai, it was released exclusively in Japan in November 1997, and was also available as a limited edition version.

In September 1998, developers H Project and Craftsman Arts released an enhanced port of the game, Mahjong Gakuensai DX: Zenjitsu ni Matsuwaru Funsenki, also produced for the Sega Saturn.
